info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 7:09PM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST SATURDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM MST Saturday. For the Blizzard Warning, from 6 AM Saturday to Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
